 Talk How to Set Opera As Your Default Internet Browser   
 You have  Opera browser  and you don't know how to set it as your default internet browser, then just follow these steps. 
 Steps Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/12\/Set-Opera-As-Your-Default-Internet-Browser-Step-1.jpg\/v4-460px-Set-Opera-As-Your-Default-Internet-Browser-Step-1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/12\/Set-Opera-As-Your-Default-Internet-Browser-Step-1.jpg\/v4-760px-Set-Opera-As-Your-Default-Internet-Browser-Step-1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Open your Opera browser and click  Tools->Preferences  from Menu Bar or you can do it by pressing  Ctrl+F12 . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b4\/Set-Opera-As-Your-Default-Internet-Browser-Step-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Set-Opera-As-Your-Default-Internet-Browser-Step-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/b\/b4\/Set-Opera-As-Your-Default-Internet-Browser-Step-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 2 
 Click on the  Advanced  tab in the  Preferences  window. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/fa\/Set-Opera-As-Your-Default-Internet-Browser-Step-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Set-Opera-As-Your-Default-Internet-Browser-Step-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/fa\/Set-Opera-As-Your-Default-Internet-Browser-Step-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Set-Opera-As-Your-Default-Internet-Browser-Step-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 3 
 Click on the  Programs  from the left side menu. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/17\/Set-Opera-As-Your-Default-Internet-Browser-Step-4.jpg\/v4-460px-Set-Opera-As-Your-Default-Internet-Browser-Step-4.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/17\/Set-Opera-As-Your-Default-Internet-Browser-Step-4.jpg\/v4-760px-Set-Opera-As-Your-Default-Internet-Browser-Step-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 4 
 Select the  Check if Opera is default browser on startup  check box and click  OK . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/1e\/Set-Opera-As-Your-Default-Internet-Browser-Step-5.jpg\/v4-460px-Set-Opera-As-Your-Default-Internet-Browser-Step-5.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/1\/1e\/Set-Opera-As-Your-Default-Internet-Browser-Step-5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 5 
 Restart your Opera browser and you will get  Use Opera as default web browser  window.  Click  Yes  to set Opera as your default  web browser .
